::Grimmler::

Grimmler lands, motioning for the others to stop. They were about a 
mile away from Dark Prime.

"Allright," he says, "How're we gonna do this? Do we sneak up on him 
or just attack?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "David Torrey" <Dachande85@m...> wrote:
> ::Dark Prime::
> 
>     He saw the probe coming at him. He watched it. He was almost to 
the Destron base, but this became interesting, he decided to wait to 
see what happened.
